comment.author: 9950064@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called First Presbyterian Church of Buffalo, NY a Photographic History, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 9950064@N03
comment._content: This is an excellent photograph of the North facing Chapel window before the 1947 redecoration and remodeling.  The chapel was the first part of the edifice constructed and services were first held here on September 11th, 1889.  The first services in the main sanctuary  were held on december 1891 and the building was not dedicated until the main tower was completed in May 1897.
